name: Directoral
description: Evaluation criteria for the achievements of a director, including artistic vision, leadership, and cultural contribution.
author: the-zinny team

criteria.name: Vision and Creativity
criteria.description: The unique artistic vision of the director and their creative storytelling choices.

criteria.name: Leadership
criteria.description: The director's ability to lead and achieve consistent quality across all domains such as cinematography, acting, and editing.

criteria.name: Emotional Resonance
criteria.description: How effectively the director conveys and evokes emotion in the audience.

criteria.name: Contribution to Arts
criteria.description: The director's advancement of their craft and influence on artistic techniques or practices.

criteria.name: Societal Impact
criteria.description: The influence of the director's work on culture, discourse, and society.

criteria.name: Literary and Historical Referential Accuracy
criteria.description: The director's ability to effectively draw from, adapt, or directly reference past literature, philosophy, or history.

criteria.name: Historical Visual Language
criteria.description: How effectively the director references and incorporates visual, editorial, or storytelling techniques that honor specific historical, filmmaking, or cultural contexts.
